lead: This week in tech highlights the evolving landscape of AI, privacy tools, and innovative hardware solutions.

stories.title: eBay updates legalese to ban AI-powered shop-bots
stories.summary: eBay has updated its terms of service to explicitly ban the use of AI-powered shop-bots. This move reflects growing concerns over the impact of AI on online marketplaces and aims to protect both buyers and sellers from unfair competition and automated purchasing tactics.

stories.title: iOS 27 may be the death of Siri as we know it
stories.summary: Apple is reportedly transforming Siri into a more advanced AI chatbot for iOS 27, potentially enhancing user interaction significantly. This change could position Siri to compete more effectively with offerings from OpenAI and Google, as Apple seeks to modernize its voice assistant.

stories.title: OpenAI just unveiled its Google Translate competitor
stories.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Translate, a new competitor to Google Translate that promises superior performance in text translation. While it currently lacks multimodal capabilities, early tests indicate that it outperforms Google in accuracy and ease of use.

stories.title: YouTube Will Soon Let Creators Make Shorts Using Their AI Likeness
stories.summary: YouTube is set to introduce a feature allowing creators to generate Shorts using AI representations of themselves. This initiative aims to enhance creative expression while ensuring that AI remains a tool rather than a replacement for human creativity.

stories.title: Testing the Claude AI coworker
stories.summary: Anthropic's new AI coworker, Claude, is designed to enhance workplace productivity by assisting with various tasks. Initial tests show promise, as users report improved efficiency and a more intuitive interaction with the AI.

stories.title: This OS quietly powers all AI - and most future IT jobs, too
stories.summary: Linux is the backbone of most AI technologies, powering everything from ChatGPT to various enterprise applications. Its open-source nature and adaptability make it the preferred choice for developers and organizations looking to harness AI capabilities.

stories.title: Slow Fire TV? This quick 30-second fix made mine run like new again
stories.summary: A simple fix involving clearing the app cache can significantly improve the performance of your Fire TV. This quick solution is a game-changer for users experiencing sluggishness in their streaming devices.

stories.title: Not to be outdone by OpenAI, Apple is reportedly developing an AI wearable
stories.summary: Apple is reportedly working on an AI wearable device, potentially set for release in 2027. This move indicates Apple's commitment to integrating AI into its product ecosystem, enhancing user experience and functionality.

stories.title: Best Buy will sell you Sony's flagship OLED TV for $1,100 off right now
stories.summary: Sony's flagship OLED TV, the Bravia 8 II, is currently available at a significant discount at Best Buy. This deal makes it an attractive option for consumers looking to upgrade their home entertainment systems without breaking the bank.

stories.title: How to strip AI from Chrome, Edge, and Firefox with one simple script
stories.summary: A new script allows users to remove AI features from popular web browsers like Chrome, Edge, and Firefox. This tool caters to those who prefer a more streamlined browsing experience without the clutter of unnecessary AI functionalities.
